name: Splicing Dice
description:
Currently there is a bug where some of the text disappears when the game is fullscreened

The Win Screen doen't pop up at the end, once you beat lvl 6 you have won

This game was made by me for the GMTK game jam 2022/07/17

WASD + SPACEBAR to move 

E  to interact

T to realign the current dice with the grid, in case it is no longer aligned
